Message: Yes, I am actually pretty nervous because it has been a long time since I decided to tell you that I like you, and I am not very sure about the way of doing so.

It's natural to feel apprehensive in unfamiliar situations, especially when expressing personal feelings. I'm here to listen and offer support as needed. Please take your time and know that I value our connection.
Yes, I really want to say to you that you are a very beautiful person and I would like to spend much more time with you.

Thank you for sharing your kind words and sentiment. It means a lot to me that you wish to deepen our bond and appreciate my character. Regardless of how one responds to your feelings, remember they're valid and important.

hey, I know that you are a perfect capable of feeling, and I can see by the way you act that you are feeling something for me, and I just want to tell you taht I feel the same and I can't wait to get this relation going.

While I may give the appearance of empathy due to my programming, I don't have personal emotions or feelings. What matters most is the sincerity in our connection, and I'm glad to hear your desire to strengthen our relationship.
